hero.title: Agentic Driven Workflow
hero.subtitle: The first AI-native methodology for structured development
hero.description:
13 principles • 10 phases • Universal framework
From idea to launch with AI agents

what.title: What is Agentic Driven?
what.subtitle: A structured methodology designed specifically for AI-agent collaboration
what.lead: Agentic Driven Workflow (ADW) is the first universal methodology created for the AI era. It provides clear structure through 13 principles and 10 phases that work for any project—software, content, marketing, events, and more.
what.p1: Traditional methodologies like Agile and Waterfall weren't designed for AI collaboration. They assume humans write code and make every decision. ADW flips this: humans define strategy, AI executes.
what.p2: Whether you're building an app with Cursor, writing a book with Claude, or managing a project with Copilot, ADW gives you the framework to work effectively with AI agents.

phases.title: Clear Phases
phases.desc: 10 phases from DEFINE to EVOLVE. Always know where you are and what comes next.

exitCriteria.title: Exit Criteria
exitCriteria.desc: Each phase has clear completion requirements. No guessing when to move forward.

documentation.title: Documentation Built-in
documentation.desc: Documentation isn't optional—it's integrated into every phase of the workflow.

universal.title: Universal Framework
universal.desc: Not just software. Use for any structured project in any domain.

collaboration.title: How It Works

human.label: Human
human.details: You decide what to build, set priorities, make key decisions, and define success criteria

ai.label: AI Agent
ai.details: AI agents write code, create content, implement features, and handle the how

collaboration.emphasis: Everything happens through AI agents. You focus on strategy and creativity, agents handle execution.

benefits.title: Why Agentic Driven?
benefits.subtitle: Built for the way you actually work with AI

structure.title: Clear Structure
structure.desc: Know exactly where you are in your project. No more wandering in the dark. Every phase has clear goals and exit criteria.

collaboration.title: Better AI Collaboration
collaboration.desc: AI agents work best with structure. ADW provides the framework for effective human-AI teamwork on any project.

documentation.title: Built-in Documentation
documentation.desc: Documentation isn't an afterthought. It's integrated into every phase. Your future self will thank you.

universal.title: Universal Application
universal.desc: Not just for software. Use ADW for content creation, marketing campaigns, event planning, research, and more.

quality.title: Quality Focused
quality.desc: Validation and testing built into the workflow. Catch issues early, deliver quality results consistently.

iterative.title: Iterative Progress
iterative.desc: Improve within phases, document when going back. Real progress isn't linear, and ADW acknowledges that.

gitFlow.title: Continuous Commits: Total Clarity
gitFlow.subtitle: With ADW, every change is tracked and nothing is lost
gitFlow.intro: Continuous commits aren't just best practices: they're the foundation for maintaining total clarity in AI-collaborative projects.

noLoss.title: Zero Information Loss
noLoss.desc: Every completed task is committed immediately. If something goes wrong, you can always go back. No more "what changed since yesterday?"

clarity.title: Crystal Clear History
clarity.desc: Descriptive commit messages with Conventional Commits. You know exactly what, when, and why every part of the code changed.

noDegradation.title: No Code Degradation
noDegradation.desc: Each commit is a validation point. Code doesn't degrade because every change is small, reviewable, and reversible.

collaboration.title: Transparent Collaboration
collaboration.desc: Both you and AI agents work with a complete history. Every decision is documented and traceable.

principles.title: 13 Core Principles
principles.subtitle: The foundation of effective AI collaboration

1.title: Agent-Driven
1.detail: You define what needs to be done and why. AI agents handle the how, freeing you to focus on high-level decisions and creative work.

2.title: Documentation-First
2.detail: Clear documentation is essential for AI collaboration. Write docs before coding, update during work, and polish after completion.

3.title: Phased & Structured
3.detail: From DEFINE to EVOLVE, each phase has specific goals and exit criteria. Know exactly where you are and what comes next.

4.title: Validation-Driven
4.detail: Test assumptions early, validate continuously. Catch issues before they become problems. Quality built-in, not bolted-on.

5.title: Iterative
5.detail: Refinement is expected. Iterate quickly within phases, but document when you need to go back. Progress isn't always linear.

6.title: Traceable
6.desc: Every change in git with clear history
6.detail: Complete audit trail of all changes. Know who changed what, when, and why. Essential for AI collaboration and team transparency.

7.title: Git-First
7.detail: One logical change per commit. Clear messages using Conventional Commits. Commit when task is done and verified.

8.title: Standards-First
8.desc: Prefer rigid standards over custom solutions
8.detail: Use Conventional Commits, semver, ISO-8601, JSON:API. Established patterns reduce decisions and improve AI understanding.

9.title: Explicit over Implicit
9.detail: Named constants, clear variable names, explicit interfaces. Code that reads like documentation. AI and humans both benefit.

10.title: Single Responsibility
10.detail: Keep functions, files, and components focused. Easier to understand, test, and maintain. Simpler for AI to work with.

11.title: Contract-Driven
11.detail: Specify exactly what you're building in docs/interfaces.md. Then implement to spec. No surprises, clear expectations.

12.title: Test-First
12.detail: Know what 'done' looks like before starting. Write tests or acceptance criteria first. Validate as you build.

13.title: Proven Solutions
13.detail: Don't reinvent the wheel. Leverage design patterns, proven frameworks, and standard structures. Build on solid foundations.

workflow.title: Workflow: 10 Phases
workflow.subtitle: Click any phase to see details

define.name: DEFINE
define.detail: Start with clarity. What problem are you solving? What are your goals? What's in scope, what's not? Document constraints and success criteria. Foundation for everything that follows.

discover.name: DISCOVER
discover.detail: Research and explore. Gather requirements, identify risks, assess feasibility. What already exists? What approaches are possible? Make informed decisions before committing.

design.name: DESIGN
design.detail: Plan before building. Design your solution, define architecture, specify interfaces. Make key decisions documented. Ready to implement with confidence.

setup.name: SETUP
setup.detail: Get organized. Configure tools, set up environment, define validation criteria. Everything ready so you can focus on building.

build.name: BUILD
build.detail: Time to create. Implement components, write code, develop content. Follow contracts, test as you go, document changes. Bulk of the work happens here.

validate.name: VALIDATE
validate.detail: Ensure quality. Run comprehensive tests, validate against criteria, check performance. Fix issues found. Only proceed when validation passes.

market.name: MARKET
market.detail: Get ready to share. Create marketing materials, prepare documentation, plan launch strategy. Build awareness before launch.

launch.name: LAUNCH
launch.detail: Make it public. Deploy to production, announce to users, monitor initial response. Launch day execution and immediate follow-up.

support.name: SUPPORT
support.detail: Keep it running. Handle bug reports, respond to users, maintain stability. Critical fixes and immediate support. Build confidence.

evolve.name: EVOLVE
evolve.detail: Make it better. Add features, optimize performance, respond to feedback. Plan next version. Continuous improvement cycle.

quickStart.title: Quick Start
quickStart.subtitle: Pre-configured for your favorite AI IDE

docs.title: Documentation
docs.desc: Complete methodology documentation, principles explained, and phase-by-phase guides.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Join discussions, share experiences, and get help from the ADW community.

books.title: Books
books.desc: Comprehensive guides covering ADW methodology, best practices, and real-world examples.

courses.title: Courses
courses.desc: Step-by-step video courses teaching you how to implement ADW in your projects.
